Text: There ya go, gravitysewers. Give me a minute (figure of speech, that minute) and I'll have the other one for you as well.
My god, your f**king awesome! Thank you!
thanks. with a title like that I bet this one did not stay on the shelf very long. :-)
and congratulations on the skull. when did that happen? or am I just blind?

You're most welcome everybody! Thanks for taking the time to drop off some kind words.

unnim2, just happened a few days ago, quite unexpectedly!

gravitysewers, well, crap! It seems I don't have the version you're looking for. In fact, I don't have either of the books Villarrubia has done with Moore, so I'll keep working on that. 

The version I have is a very quality printing and scanning of the Veitch's 'Heartburst and Other Pleasures'. That version is by Alan Moore, Rick Veitch and Steve Bissette. I'll go ahead and up that one, because it's not available right now, and continue to look for the other Moore/Villarrubia books.
